pageTitle: FIX: The "Derived Column" transformation may produce incorrect results when you run a package in Microsoft SQL Server 2008 or SQL Server 2008 R2 Integration Services
textBeforeTable: Expand this table Collapse this table loadTOCNode(4, 'resolution'); SQL Server 2008 Database Services Core Shared loadTOCNode(3, 'resolution'); The English version of this hotfix has the file attributes (or later file attributes) that are listed in the following table. The dates and times for these files are listed in Coordinated Universal Time (UTC). When you view the file information, it is converted to local time. To find the difference between UTC and local time, use the loadTOCNode(3, 'resolution'); This hotfix does not replace any other hotfixes. loadTOCNode(3, 'resolution'); You do not have to change the registry after you apply this hotfix. loadTOCNode(3, 'resolution'); You may have to restart the computer after you apply this hotfix. loadTOCNode(3, 'resolution'); To apply this hotfix, you must have SQL Server 2008 Service Pack 1 (SP1) installed. loadTOCNode(3, 'resolution');
